text: Khatik Mohalla is a village in Meerut district of Uttar Pradesh, India. It is located 6.2 kilometres from Meerut bus stand, 6.3 kilometres from Meerut and 4.6 kilometres from Army Hospital, Meerut Cantt. The village is administrated by a sarpanch who is an elected representative of village as per Panchayati raj (India). ==Transport== Meerut city railway junction is the nearest train station. The village is 19 kilometres away from Dr. Bhimrao Ambedkar airport in Meerut and the nearest international airport is Indira Gandhi International airport located in Delhi which is 98 kilometres. == References == Category:Villages in Meerut district
title: Khatik Mohalla (Meerut)
